channel.title: Friday Night Comedy from BBC Radio 4
channel.description: Bringing you a satirical take on the week's news with the cream of UK comedy talent from BBC Radio 4.

item.title: FriComedy: Xmas party political indiscretions
item.description: On the last 'normal' show of the year (next week is The Now Show panto) Marcus Brigstocke talks about the English Defence League and the other Terry Jones; Jon Holmes travels into the Matrix of real and unreal news; Mitch Benn assesses how happy we are this Christmas and our audience reflect on the most memorable moments of 2010.
